> Can there be an image picker similar to Discord on the forums? And MAYBE some sort of More than 10 members version of PM

Nope.

As we've pointed out numerous times, *<u>Squad does not write the forum software</u>*.  It's a third-party product and Squad just runs it pretty much "off the shelf", with a few minor customizable things tweaked.  So, if you have a request for "new features for the forum", you'd need to go talk to the forum software vendor, not here.  ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
